definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Japanese, facing starvation, subsisted on roots and grass.
sentences.chinese: 整個日本面臨着飢餓，人們僅靠樹根和草維持生命。

sentences.english: They lived by hunting and by gathering roots nuts, and wild fruits.
sentences.chinese: 他們靠打獵和收集樹根果仁和野果爲生。

sentences.english: Elephants use their tusks to get food by digging up roots and prying bark off trees.
sentences.chinese: 非洲象用它們的長牙挖樹根，扒樹皮來獲取食物。

sentences.english: I exclaimed, pointing to a nook under the roots of one twisted tree.
sentences.chinese: 我叫道，指着一棵扭曲的樹根下面的一個凹洞。

sentences.english: Haiti's trees and roots used to keep the mountainous island's soil in place.
sentences.chinese: 海地的樹木和樹根過去使這個多山島國的土壤穩固。

sentences.english: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
sentences.chinese: 教育之樹根部是苦的，但其果實是甜蜜的。

sentences.english: The limestone is sufficiently fissured for tree roots to have breached the roof of the cave.
sentences.chinese: 石灰岩上有許多縫隙，故而樹根能從巖洞頂部長出來。

sentences.english: Entangling Roots and Ensnare work on Heroes again.
sentences.chinese: 樹根纏繞和誘捕再次對英雄有效。

sentences.english: Remove all organic material, including roots, when preparing the sub-grade.
sentences.chinese: 在準備地基時要去除全部有機物質，包括樹根草根。

sentences.english: The hurricane flattered crops, uprooted trees, washed away roads and rippled off roofs.
sentences.chinese: 颶風所到之處，莊稼倒伏，樹根拔起，房頂掀飛。

sentences.english: If you pour water on the root, the water will be distributed all over the tree.
sentences.chinese: 如果你將水澆到樹根，水分自然會被運到全樹各處。

sentences.english: WIDER as she trots with perfect balance along the root, which
sentences.chinese: 她以出色的平衡能力沿着一根逐漸升高的樹根小跑。

sentences.english: Tian Shugen in order to get the money, but also willing to sell to the distillery.
sentences.chinese: 田樹根爲了能夠拿到錢，也願意把酒坊給賣掉。

sentences.english: The root of the tree rotted away.
sentences.chinese: 這棵死樹根被螞蟻唼了。

sentences.english: Tree roots forming crocodile-like head, Lake District, England.
sentences.chinese: 類似鱷魚頭的三隻樹根。

definition: to involve/to implicate sb/to spread to others (harm, trouble, damage etc)
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
to be reborn/to recover/to come back to life/to regenerate
to warn repeatedly/to urge/to exhort again and again
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
from time to time/now and then/occasionally/frequently
